personalInfo.name: Willie Huang
personalInfo.bio: Extremely passionate and curious about data science, I embrace new technologies and enjoy using various data science tools to extract insights from data. I am eager to continuously learn and build a solid foundation in my career.

about.description: A passionate Data Engineer with a strong background in building data infrastructures. I love solving complex data problems and optimizing performance. Extremely passionate and curious about data science, trying to dig into insights from data itself through various data science tools, embracing new technologies, and eager to keep learning and build a solid foundation in my career.

description: Independently designed and developed an AI-labeling system for a social media platform, integrating LLM (AWS Bedrock, PydanticAI), Flask, Kafka, and Dagster to create a complete data processing pipeline.
Designed and implemented a Multi-modal RAG system.
Designed and implemented a Structured data RAG system.

Responsible for data platform architecture optimization, system design, and operation of basic infrastructure such as Airbyte (integrated with Terraform for management), dbt, Dagster, and BigQuery, promoting the automation and standardization of data processing flows.
Led 4 junior engineers to familiarize them with basic concepts of data engineering, team technical culture, and system design, improving the overall technical level of the team.
Text mining for customer feedback data
Data pipeline used for collecting total mobile install data from various datasource
Data migration of existed projects handled by our data team
Data pipeline, processing tens of millions of records/GB-level data through Airflow for ETL/ELT.
Data warehouse, performing near real-time analysis on big data.
Data visualization using tools like Superset and Tableau.

education.school: National Chiao Tung University, Institute of Information Management
National Cheng Kung University, Department of Industrial and Information Management

publications.title: Attentive gated graph sequence neural network-based time-series information fusion for financial trading
publications.description: First author of paper in top-tier computer science journal - Information Fusion.

projects.title: AI-labeling system for social media platform
projects.description: Independently designed and developed an AI-labeling system for a social media platform, integrating LLM (AWS Bedrock, PydanticAI), Flask, Kafka, and Dagster to create a complete data processing pipeline.

projects.title: Multi-modal RAG system
projects.description: Researched and applied the latest multi-modal RAG papers, using Llamaindex with Huggingface or large-scale API implementation systems, and developed a baseline multi-modal RAG system based on the Gemini 2.5 series of large models.

projects.title: Structured data RAG system
projects.description: Using DuckDB with Gemini-2.5-flash-lite, designed a system architecture with highly competitive retrieval time and cost, which can be used immediately after users upload files.

projects.title: Text mining for customer feedback data
projects.description: A NLP model (LDA) was built to model topics, trying to find potential topics or keywords from the original user feedback data, and the prediction results were presented on a dashboard in Tableau.

projects.title: Personalized recommendation system (Data product)
projects.description: Developed the 'For You' feature of the company's product 'Promeo' from scratch, training a deep learning-based recommendation system through product interaction data to provide personalized recommendations for subscribers.
